mathematica: max = 22; f[x_, y_] := Sum[n!*((x*y)^n/(1+x*(y-1))^(2*n+1)), {n, 0, max}]; t = MapIndexed[Take[#1, #2[[1]]]&, CoefficientList[Series[f[x, y], {x, 0, max}, {y, 0, max}], {x, y}]]; a[n_] := If[n<3, 0, t[[n+1, n-2]]]; Table[ a[n], {n, 0, max}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 08 2016, after _Vladeta Jovovic_ in A058057 *)
